In England, in the seven days to 22 June, there were 67,252 new confirmed cases (118.9 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 15 June, there were 48,230 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 39% (19,022 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 27 June is 4,118,462 (7,282.9 cases per 100,000 population).
